__e: Don't I yearn and... ache and shop?
She told me that holding this baby filled her with a longing and a hope to have children of her own.
I just though I might like to call you.
Since that week we had together in Paris, I have been lonely for you.
I'll be gone in a minute, but I was longing for you!
But even without a family... I can promise you that that yearning to be with other people is powerful.
So that I can look at you, and your mother and your brother when I'm feeling lonesome for you.
If there's one thing I've learned in all my years on the road, it's when somebody's pining for somebody else.
